did.head: Descriptive Summary

did.unittitle:
Papers of the President of the University of Virginia, Office Administrative Files
1992-1993

accessrestrict.head: Access Restrictions
accessrestrict.p: Access restrictions may apply to specific student records under the terms of the Family Educational Rights and Privacy Act (F.E.R.P.A.).

userestrict.head: Use Restrictions
userestrict.p:
See the
Univeristy of Virginia Library’s use policy.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Papers of the President of the University of Virginia, Office Administrative Files, Accession #RG-2/1/2.961, Special Collections, University of Virginia Library, Charlottesville, Va.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: This collection was transferred on 1996 February 13.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Information
scopecontent.p: These files constitute the major record series generated by John Thomas Casteen, the president of the University of Virginia. The records consist chiefly of correspondence, but also include reports, minutes, clippings, memoranda, and related papers concerning all areas of business of the president's office.
The papers consist of: general and committee files.

arrangement.head: Organization
arrangement.p:
SERIES I: General Files, 1992-1993 Boxes 1-56
SERIES II: Committee Files, 1992-1993 Boxes 57-60
SERIES III: Restricted Files, 1992-1993 Box 61
